p: The major chemical constituent found in the essential oil of A. conyzoides was precocene I with a concentration of 92.75% as reported by Furtado et al. ( 2005). These authors also found a 62.6% majority in this plant. Martins et al. ( 2005) evaluated the chemical composition of mentrasto oil and found 38 compounds including precocene I which concentration was 34.4%. Different sesquiterpene hydrocarbons are present in the concentration of 6.05%, and 5.1% correspond to the caryophyllene, which is he main oxygenated sesquiterpene found in the plant.
